mapper.select: SELECT o.product_code, o.order_no, o.order_count, (SELECT SUM(KG) FROM FINPRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = o.product_code), o.export_count, p.product_name, p.std_id, p.unit_id FROM orders o INNER JOIN product p ON o.product_code = p.product_code INNER JOIN finproduct f ON o.product_code = f.product_code WHERE f.state='포장완료';
